name: Asteroid Invaders (itch)
description:
GAME INSTRUCTIONS:

Arrow keys to steer

(hold forward to thrust, hold down arrow to auto-reverse and stop your momentum)

Space to Shoot

Shift to switch weapons

THE LITTLE SPORES can only be killed with the SCRUBBER (that's the glowy circle weapon). If the spores eat enough crystals, they become alien babies which have to be killed with the GUN.
